</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;5&#x2014;FAIR VALUE MEASUREMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The company measures fair value in accordance with the applicable accounting standards in the FASB Codification. Fair value is a market-based measurement that should be determined based on assumptions that market participants would use in pricing an asset or liability. As a basis for considering such assumptions, there exists a three-tier fair value hierarchy, which prioritizes the inputs used in measuring fair value as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;1&#x2014;unadjusted quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the company has the ability to access as of the measurement date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;2&#x2014;inputs other than quoted prices included within Level&nbsp;1 that are directly observable for the asset or liability, or indirectly observable through corroboration with observable market data.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Level&nbsp;3&#x2014;unobservable inputs for the asset or liability are only used when there is little, if any, market activity for the asset or liability at the measurement date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This hierarchy requires the company to use observable market data, when available, and to minimize the use of unobservable inputs when determining fair value.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Recurring Fair Value Estimates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath has issued warrants, of which some are classified as equity and some as liabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The warrants issued in March&nbsp;2012 (and expiring in March&nbsp;2017) provide that in the event of a fundamental transaction, as defined by the warrant agreement, the company may, under certain circumstances, be obligated to settle the March&nbsp;2012 warrants for cash equal to the value of the warrants determined in accordance with the warrant agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The fair value and significant unobservable inputs (level 3) of the March&nbsp;2012 warrants was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	zero
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as of December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Recurring Level 3 Activity, Reconciliation, and Basis for Valuation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The table below provides a reconciliation of the beginning and ending balances for the liabilities measured at fair value using significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;

</P>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:85.96%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 12PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Change in fair value of warrants&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:02.72%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 12PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:01.72%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:08.16%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	(850,000)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:01.44%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;

</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:85.96%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 12PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	Warrant liability as of December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>

	$
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The company determined the fair value of the warrant liability for certain warrants, as applicable, using a Black-Scholes model. The model considered amounts and timing of future possible equity and warrant issuances and volatility of the company&#x2019;s stock price equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, as specified in the underlying warrants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2014;RESEARCH AND LICENSE AGREEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In August 2005, Lpath entered into a collaboration agreement (the &#x201C;AERES Agreement&#x201D;) with AERES Biomedical Limited (&#x201C;AERES&#x201D;) to &#x201C;humanize&#x201D; the company&#x2019;s Sphingomab monoclonal antibody. Humanization under this agreement with AERES involves utilizing proprietary processes owned by AERES for the purpose of modifying Sphingomab antibodies originally contained in mice for potential human acceptance in a clinical trial. The humanized version of Sphingomab that was produced from the collaboration with AERES is called Sonepcizumab. In 2014, AERES&#x2019; rights and obligations pursuant to the AERES Agreement with Lpath were transferred to Medical Research Council Technology (&#x201C;MRCT&#x201D;) by means of a Deed of Novation, which obligates MRCT to perform and be bound by the terms of the AERES Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	amounts were paid to AERES or MRCT during 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Lpath could owe MRCT certain additional contingent amounts when drug candidates based on Sonepcizumab pass through the levels of the FDA drug review and approval process. MRCT will be entitled to a royalty, not to exceed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, on any revenues generated by the ultimate commercialization of any drug candidate based on Sonepcizumab.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2014;STOCKHOLDERS&#x2019; EQUITY
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Common Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In March 2014, the company entered into an at-the-market issuance sales agreement (the &#x201C;Sales Agreement&#x201D;) with MLV &amp; Co.&nbsp;&nbsp;(the &#x201C;MLV Agreement&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to limitations set by the SEC, the company may from time to time, at the company&#x2019;s option, issue and, through MLV, sell shares of its common stock having an aggregate offering price of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million under the MLV Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sales of common stock through MLV, if any, will be made by any method that is deemed an &#x201C;at-the-market&#x201D; offering as defined in Rule 415 promulgated under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, including by means of ordinary brokers&#x2019; transactions at market prices, in block transactions or as otherwise agreed by the Lpath and MLV. Subject to the terms and conditions of the MLV Agreement, MLV will use commercially reasonable efforts to sell the common stock based upon the company&#x2019;s instructions (including any price, time or size limits or other customary parameters or conditions the Company may impose). Lpath is not obligated to make any sales of its common stock under the MLV Agreement. Any shares sold will be sold pursuant to the company&#x2019;s effective shelf registration statement on Form S-3 (the &#x201C;Shelf Registration Statement&#x201D;). The company will pay MLV a commission of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the gross proceeds. The MLV Agreement will terminate upon the earlier of the sale of all common stock subject to the MLV Agreement or termination of the MLV Agreement by the company or MLV.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During 2015, the company sold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13,674,916
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares at sales prices ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.34
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share, resulting in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3,722,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in net proceeds.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the year ended December 31, 2014, the company sold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2,161,833
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares at sales prices ranging from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$5.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share, resulting in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$9,730,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in net proceeds.&nbsp;&nbsp;There have been
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales of shares through the MLV Agreement subsequent to December 31, 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Under the SEC&#x2019;s rules, the company will not be eligible to sell any shares under the Shelf Registration Statement and the accompanying MLV Agreement immediately following the filing of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because the market value of the company&#x2019;s common stock held by non-affiliate stockholders is less than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$75
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million, the SEC limits the amount of stock the company may only offer and sell during any 12 month period to a maximum of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	one-third
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the market value of the common stock held by company&#x2019;s non-affiliate stockholders.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	56
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>

</DIV>

	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#LPTN-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	required to select a new measurement date for its market value each time it files an Annual Report on Form 10-K.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, based on the current market value of the company&#x2019;s common stock and its sales under the MLV Agreement within the past 12 months, the company has no current eligibility to make sales under the Shelf Registration Statement and the accompanying MLV Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In September 2014, Lpath sold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3,605,042
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	registered shares of common stock and warrants to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3,605,042
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	unregistered shares of common stock in a direct offering at a purchase price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.475
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share-and-warrant-share combination.&nbsp;&nbsp;The warrants have an exercise price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.36
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per underlying share, are immediately exercisable, and terminate on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-year anniversary of issuance.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each warrant may be exercised using a cashless exercise procedure if the resale of the underlying shares are not covered by an effective registration statement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Net proceeds of this offering totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$11,500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	after deducting placement agent fees and other expenses of the offering. Maxim Group LLC (&#x201C;Maxim&#x201D;) acted as the exclusive placement agent for the offering.&nbsp;&nbsp;Maxim received a placement agent fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$751,651
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and an unregistered warrant to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	54,076
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	unregistered shares of common stock (the &#x201C;Maxim Warrant&#x201D;) as well as the reimbursement of fees and expenses up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$60,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Maxim Warrant has an exercise price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3.36
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share, is immediately exercisable, and will terminate on August 23, 2018.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In October 2014, pursuant to the terms of a registration rights agreement the company entered into in connection with the direct offering discussed above, the company registered for resale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3,605,042
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares of common stock issuable upon exercise of the warrants issued in the direct offering discussed above.&nbsp;&nbsp;The shares were registered on Form S-3 and the registration statement was declared effective by the Securities and Exchange Commission on October 23, 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath is authorized to issue up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares of preferred stock, with a par value of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share. As of December 31, 2015 and 2014, there were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	preferred stock shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or outstanding.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Equity Incentive Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In November&nbsp;2005, the company adopted the Lpath,&nbsp;Inc. 2005 Stock Option and Stock Purchase Plan, which permitted stock option grants to employees, outside consultants, and directors. In October&nbsp;2007, Lpath&#x2019;s stockholders approved the amendment of this plan which was concurrently renamed the Lpath,&nbsp;Inc. Amended and Restated 2005 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;Plan&#x201D;). There are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2,500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares of common stock authorized for grant under the Plan. The Plan allows for grants of incentive stock options with exercise prices of at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the fair market value of Lpath&#x2019;s common stock, nonqualified options with exercise prices of at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	85%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the fair market value of the company&#x2019;s common stock, restricted stock, and restricted stock units. All stock options granted to date have a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-year life and vest over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	zero
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	years. Restricted stock units granted have a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-year life and vest over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	zero
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	years, or upon the achievement of specified clinical trial milestones. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1,429,128
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	shares of common stock were available for future grant under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following table presents stock-based compensation as included in the company&#x2019;s consolidated statements of operations:

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT SIZE="1">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	57
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage58"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#LPTN-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fair value is determined at the date of grant for employee options and restricted stock units, and at the date at which the grantee&#x2019;s performance is complete for non-employee options and restricted stock units. Compensation cost is recognized over the vesting period based on the fair value of the options and restricted stock units.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Because of the company&#x2019;s net operating losses for tax purposes, it did not realize any tax benefits for the tax deductions from share-based payment arrangements during the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Stock Options
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,221,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of total unrecognized compensation expense, net of estimated forfeitures, related to unvested options granted under the Plan.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	That expense is expected to be recognized over a weighted-average period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The company uses the Black-Scholes valuation model to estimate the fair value of stock options at the grant date. The Black-Scholes valuation model uses the option exercise price as well as estimates and assumptions related to the expected price volatility of the company&#x2019;s stock, the rate of return on risk-free investments, the expected period during which the options will be outstanding, and the expected dividend yield for the company&#x2019;s stock to estimate the fair value of a stock option on the grant date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The weighted-average valuation assumptions were determined as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected stock price volatility:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The estimated expected volatility is based on a weighted-average calculation of a peer group and the company&#x2019;s historical volatility.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Risk-free interest rate:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The company bases the risk-free interest rate on the interest rate payable on U.S. Treasury debt securities.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected term of options:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The expected term of options granted is derived using assumed exercise rates based on historical exercise patterns and represents the period of time that options granted are expected to be outstanding.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	The estimated fair value of stock options granted was determined using a Black-Scholes valuation model with the following weighted average assumptions:

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:46.40PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:3PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	0%
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The aggregate intrinsic value in the table above represents the total intrinsic value which would have been received by the stock option holders had all option holders exercised their options as of that date. The aggregate intrinsic value is calculated as the difference between the fair market value of the company&#x2019;s common stock on December&nbsp;31, 2015 of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and the exercise price of stock options, multiplied by the number of shares subject to such stock options.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At December&nbsp;31, 2015, all of the company&#x2019;s outstanding stock options had strike prices above the company&#x2019;s market price of $0.23.&nbsp;&nbsp;The total intrinsic value of options exercised during the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$159,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$3,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively. Cash received from option exercises during the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$48,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$250
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively. Upon stock option exercises, the company issues new shares of common stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Restricted Stock Units
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$387,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of total unrecognized stock-based compensation expense related to unvested restricted stock units granted under the Plan. The company expects to recognize that expense over a weighted-average period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;years.
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<FONT SIZE="1">

</P>

	59

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#LPTN-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

	Table of Contents

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Warrants
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath has issued warrants, of which some are classified as equity and some as liabilities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The warrants issued in March&nbsp;2012 (and expiring in March&nbsp;2017) provide that in the event of a fundamental transaction, as defined by the warrant agreement, the company may, under certain circumstances, be obligated to settle the March&nbsp;2012 warrants for cash equal to the value of the warrants determined in accordance with the warrant agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The following warrants contained such provisions, and therefore, pursuant to the applicable criteria, they were not indexed to the company&#x2019;s own stock:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The warrant liability reflected on Lpath&#x2019;s balance sheet is a consequence of current generally accepted accounting principles, arising from the implementation of ASC 815. The company believes there is no foreseeable circumstance under which Lpath can be required to make any cash payment to settle
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrant liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	that would be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	carried on the consolidated balance sheet.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	The following table summarizes Lpath warrants outstanding as of December&nbsp;31, 2015:

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:75.12%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The terms of all outstanding warrants permit the company, upon exercise of the warrants, to settle the contract by the delivery of unregistered shares. During 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants were granted,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants were exercised, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5,715
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants expired. During 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3,669,118
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants were granted,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants were exercised, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12,858
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	warrants expired.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2014;INCOME TAXES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Lpath had federal and California net operating loss (&#x201C;NOL&#x201D;) carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$82
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$74
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million, respectively, that will expire beginning in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and continue expiring through 203
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Portions of these NOL carryforwards may be used to offset future taxable income, if any.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Lpath also has federal and California research and development tax credit carryforwards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	respectively, available to offset future taxes. The federal credits begin expiring in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and the state credits do not expire.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ompany's ability to use its net operating loss and research and development credit carryforwards may be substantially limited due to ownership change limitations that may have occurred or that could occur in the future, as required by Section 382 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, as well as similar state provisions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ompany has not completed a study to assess whether an ownership change has occurred or whether there have been multiple ownership changes since the Company became a &#x201C;loss corporation&#x201D; under the definition of Section 382.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Due to the existence of the valuation allowance, it is not expected that any possible limitation will have an impact on the results of operations or financial position of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ompany.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Realization of the deferred tax assets is dependent upon the generation of future taxable income, the amount and timing of which are uncertain. Accordingly, the net deferred tax assets have been fully offset by a valuation allowance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As a result of the company&#x2019;s significant operating loss carryforwards and the corresponding valuation allowance,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	income tax provision/benefit has been recorded as of December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The provision for income taxes using the statutory federal income tax rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	34%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as compared to the company&#x2019;s effective tax rate is summarized as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2014;OPERATING LEASE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath leases an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11,960
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	square foot laboratory and office facility in San Diego, California. The lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expires in November 2016.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Monthly lease payments are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$28,268
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, with annual escalations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The lease grants the Company the right to extend the lease for an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-year term.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath&#x2019;s rent expense totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$390,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$385,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the years ended December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively. Lpath&#x2019;s sublease income amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$12,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the years ended December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2014;RELATED-PARTY TRANSACTIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lpath subleases a portion of its facility to Western States Investment Corporation (&#x201C;WSIC&#x201D;), owned by one of Lpath&#x2019;s largest stockholders. The terms of the sublease, in general, are the same as the terms of the company&#x2019;s direct lease. In addition, certain Lpath employees provide investment oversight, accounting, and other administrative services to WSIC. Certain WSIC employees also provide services to Lpath. Lpath and WSIC reimburse each other for costs incurred on behalf of the other entity. Lpath&#x2019;s sublease income amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$11,652
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the years ended December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, WSIC billed Lpath
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ITEM 9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;CONTROLS AND PROCEDURE
</FONT>
<A NAME="LPTN-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM9ACONTROLSANDPROCEDURES_822317">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	S
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)&nbsp; Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and Procedures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Our interim chief executive officer and chief financial officer, after evaluating the effectiveness of our disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Rule&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and Rule&nbsp;15d-15(e)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201C;Exchange Act&#x201D;)) as of the end of the period covered by this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K, have concluded that, based on such evaluation, our disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of the end of such period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:39PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(2)&nbsp; Management&#x2019;s Annual Report on Internal Control over Financial Reporting.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Our management is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting. Internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Rule&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and Rule&nbsp;15d-15(f)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended) is a process designed by, or under the supervision of, our principal executive and principal financial officers and effected by our Board of Directors, management and other personnel, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our management, under the supervision of our interim chief executive officer and chief financial officer, assessed the effectiveness of our internal control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. In making this assessment, we used the criteria set forth in the Internal Control-Integrated Framework issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO) in 2013. Based on this assessment, our management has concluded that, as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, our internal control over financial reporting was effective based on those criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This annual report does not include an attestation report of our independent registered public accounting firm regarding internal control over financial reporting. Our report was not subject to attestation by our independent registered public accounting firm pursuant to temporary rules&nbsp;of the Securities and Exchange Commission that permit us to provide only management&#x2019;s report in this annual report.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(3)&nbsp; Changes in Internal Control over Financial Reporting.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;During the quarter ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, there were no changes in our internal control over financial reporting that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(4)&nbsp; Inherent Limitations on Effectiveness of Controls.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Our management, including our interim chief executive officer and chief financial officer, do not expect that our disclosure controls or our internal control over financial reporting will prevent or detect all error and all fraud. A control system, no matter how well designed and operated, can provide only reasonable, not absolute, assurance that the control system&#x2019;s objectives will be met. The design of a control system must reflect the fact that there are resource constraints, and the benefits of controls must be considered relative to their costs. Further, because of the inherent limitations in all control systems, no evaluation of controls can provide absolute assurance that misstatements due to error or fraud will not occur or that all control issues and instances of fraud, if any, have been detected. These inherent limitations include the realities that judgments in decision-making can be faulty and that breakdowns can occur because of simple error or mistake. Controls can also be circumvented by the individual acts of some persons, by collusion of two or more people, or by management override of the controls. The design of any system of controls is based in part on certain assumptions about the likelihood of future events, and there can be no assurance that any design will succeed in achieving its stated goals under all potential future conditions. Projections of any evaluation of controls effectiveness to future periods are subject to risks. Over time, controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions or deterioration in the degree of compliance with policies or procedures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	62
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	Position

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:31.88%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following sets forth information regarding the business experience of our directors and executive officers as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	February
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;1, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Daniel H. Petree
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Chairman of the Board of Directors
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mr.&nbsp;Petree has served as a director of Lpath since November&nbsp;2008, and was appointed as Chairman of the Board in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	September
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;2010. Mr.&nbsp;Petree has over 20&nbsp;years of experience in the biotechnology industry, serving in a variety of roles including investment banker, senior operating manager and corporate and securities lawyer. Mr.&nbsp;Petree is a member and co-founder of P2&nbsp;Partners,&nbsp;LLC formed in 2000, and a member and co-founder of Four Oaks Partners Consulting, LLC, founded in April&nbsp;2012, both of which provide transaction advisory services to small and medium-sized science companies. Mr.&nbsp;Petree served as a director of Cypress Biosciences,&nbsp;Inc., a company that provides products for the treatment of patients with Functional Somatic Syndromes and other central nervous system disorders from 2004 to 2011. Before co-founding P2 Partners in 2000, Mr.&nbsp;Petree was President and Chief Operating Officer of Axys Pharmaceuticals, a structure-based drug design company in South San Francisco. Mr.&nbsp;Petree&#x2019;s qualifications to sit on our Board include his experience as an executive and an investment banker in the biotechnology industry, his experience with structuring and negotiating pharmaceutical partnering arrangements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and strategic transactions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and his experience serving on public company boards and board committees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Jeffrey A. Ferrell
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Director
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mr.&nbsp;Ferrell has served as a director of Lpath since April&nbsp;2007. Mr.&nbsp;Ferrell has served as the Managing Partner of Athyrium Capital Management,&nbsp;LP, a life sciences focused investment and advisory company with offices in New York City, since 2008. From 2001 to 2008, Mr.&nbsp;Ferrell served in a number of capacities at Lehman Brothers. He oversaw public and private life sciences investments for Global Trading Strategies, a principal investment group within Lehman, as a Senior Vice President from 2005 to 2008. Prior to that he was a Vice President in Lehman Brothers&#x2019; Private Equity division. Prior to joining Lehman in 2001, he was a principal at Schroder Ventures Life Sciences in Boston. Mr.&nbsp;Ferrell holds an A.B. in Biochemical Sciences from Harvard University. Mr.&nbsp;Ferrell&#x2019;s qualifications to sit on our Board include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	63
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
